name: imperra-marketplace
description: Monorepo for Imperra Marketplace with Next.js frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter web dev & pnpm --filter api start:dev -p 3009
scripts.build: pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter api build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter web lint && pnpm --filter api lint
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter web clean && pnpm --filter api clean
